on.from sentence: To assess the influence of different aspects of the supervised system and its training algorithm , we carried out a few simple ablation tests on subtask 1 A .

techniques.from sentence: These results show that 2 of the techniques we used , namely subsampling and multitask learning , actually harmed our system 's performance on test set 1 A , although our experiments on the trial set suggested that they would be beneficial .

fine - tuning.from sentence: On the other hand , fine - tuning the word embeddings during training seems to be one of the keys to the success of this approach , as are the use of multiple projection matrices , and the sampling of multiple negative examples for each positive example .

supervised model.from sentence: We should also note that the supervised model is prone to overfitting , and we found early stopping to be particularly important .
